title: Turkish Bread
instructions: In a bowl, mix the flour, dry yeast, sugar, and salt.
Add the warm water and olive oil. Mix until a dough forms.
Knead the dough for about 10 minutes until smooth and elastic.
Cover the bowl and let the dough rise for 1 hour, or until doubled in size.
Divide the dough into portions and shape into flat rounds.
Place the rounds on a baking tray lined with parchment paper.
Brush the tops with water and sprinkle with sesame seeds.
Bake in a preheated oven at 200°C (390°F) for 15-20 minutes, or until golden brown.
notes: You can use nigella seeds in addition to sesame seeds for extra flavor.
Serve warm with dips or as a side to main dishes.
